DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate safety, tolerability and performance of the CyclaPlex implant, a button and suture type implant device and instruments for the correction of the first inter metatarsal angle in subjects suffering from Hallux Valgus deformity.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of CyclaPlex Implant for Correction of First Inter Metatarsal Angle in Subjects Suffering From Hallux Valgus Deformity
DOC.criteria: Weight less than 100 kilos IMA greater than 12 degrees IMA less than 7 degrees Diabetics Known osteoporosis Known allergy or hypersensitivity to metals Gout or any systemic inflammatory arthropathy
